column4: i need some help, my partition table got messed up, can i restore it without formatting?(its important, cause all my source for my project is there :( )
data is still there, i am 100% sure, just programs get all messed up and i cant mount shit
that language won't get you very far
the data is there, but without a partition table you can't do anything with it
some stuff can read it.. but some cant
